Ayesha Khan.description: continuing her research and taking notes at the library (conversing about promoting diversity, inclusion, and equity in their collaboration by actively seeking out and uplifting marginalized voices, engaging with the local community, showcasing a mix of established and emerging artists from different backgrounds, providing accessibility with sign language interpretation and subtitles, organizing workshops on allyship and privilege, featuring spoken word performances on unconscious bias and microaggressions, addressing unconscious bias and microaggressions, creating a safe space for open dialogue and learning, involving more voices from underrepresented communities, centering the perspectives of Black individuals, and actively listening, learning, supporting, and uplifting Black voices in their work) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
